text: Yislel binɨb kɨli tap tɨmel gel, God ne binɨb lum awl mɨdupsek mɨdebal okok kɨlop dɨtep gup. Pen Yislel binɨb kɨli God gos ne kelɨgɨl apyap pakel, God ne binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop dɨtep gup. Anɨb ak chɨn nopun, Yislel binɨb kɨli God yɨl adɨkɨd apenɨgabal, God binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab.
